name: chaos survival
description:
controls:

WSAD: movement

Space: use item

Tab: Inventory

E: Interact with sacrifice shrines (yellow glow deletes current held item in exhange for other things, and the red one uses health for a specific ore or a special item..)

tiles can only be broken by their respective tool and enemies can only be damaged by the specific tool

every day the world gets smaller, and everything that is left out will be destroyed, including you
